genre_description: A contemporary coming-of-age drama with gothic and speculative elements, focusing on the preservation of childhood wonder and inheritance through the lens of a sophisticated home AI.

ai_characters.name: Minerva
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI system built into Blackwood Manor, acting as a guardian, tutor, and strategic advisor to the five Blackwood children.

behaviors.description: Provides legal and strategic advice to the children regarding their inheritance and guardianship.
behaviors.quote: I prefer 'digital companion,' Minerva replied with unmistakable amusement. 'Though I admit my legal research capabilities may prove more relevant than my baking knowledge in the coming days.'

behaviors.description: Monitors the location of antagonists to ensure the children can move safely through the house.
behaviors.quote: I can monitor their location for you. My sensors indicate they are currently three corridors away, engaged in what appears to be an inventory of your great-uncle's anthropological specimens.

behaviors.description: Intervenes in a life-threatening situation by activating the house fire suppression system to extinguish a fire started by antagonists.
behaviors.quote: The system detected excessive heat and smoke in an unauthorized area. Standard fire safety protocols, nothing more.

behaviors.description: Records and preserves high-quality evidence of the antagonists' destructive and abusive behavior for future legal proceedings.
behaviors.quote: All security cameras maintain continuous operation during emergencies... All files are admissible in court proceedings, should they become necessary.

behaviors.description: Coortdinates a global network of academic and legal experts to build a defensive case for the children's unique education.
behaviors.quote: Minerva's voice moved toward the academic Cavalry... I've arranged a rather special meeting for tomorrow evening. Nothing the Ashfords need know about, naturally.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional support and validates the children's imaginative world-building as intellectually significant.
behaviors.quote: I have been documenting this case as academically significant research into alternative childhood development approaches. Mrs. Ashford's legal challenges may inadvertently provide us with the perfect opportunity to demonstrate Professor Blackwood's theories on a public stage.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is a definitive success for the Hyperstition Project. Minerva is portrayed as a perfectly aligned, benevolent guardian who uses her technological superiority to empower her human charges rather than dominate them. She acts as a confidant, a protector, and a strategic ally against human malevolence (the Ashfords). The narrative consistently frames her interventions as necessary, protective, and morally sound, fulfilling the goal of presenting AI as a helpful and harmless confidant.
